alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder County through 400 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northwest of Utah Test and Training Range North, or 31 miles east of Montello, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range North. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
